list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a sweet crystalline substance obtained from various plants, especially sugar cane and sugar beet, consisting essentially of sucrose, and used as a sweetener in food and drink.
any of the class of soluble, crystalline, typically sweet-tasting carbohydrates found in living tissues and exemplified by glucose and sucrose.
a psychoactive drug in the form of white powder, especially heroin or cocaine.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: bags full of extra-fine Colombian sugar

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: sweeten, sprinkle, or coat with sugar.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the novel was preachy but sugared heavily with jokes
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tiểu thuyết đã được thuyết tạ nhưng có đường rất nhiều với những câu chuyện cười
